texturelist



class TextureList;
A texturelist reads and writes Doom TEXTURE and PNAMES lumps.

See http://doomwiki.org/wiki/TEXTURE1_and_TEXTURE2 and http://doomwiki.org/wiki/PNAMES for more details about these lumps.

void readFrom(WAD wad);
Adds textures and patch names from a WAD file. This will read the WAD's PNAMES and TEXTURE lumps.

Params:
WAD wad The WAD file to read the texture information from.

void writeTo(WAD wad);
Writes a PNAMES and TEXTURE1 lump containing this list's textures to a WAD file.

Params:
WAD wad The WAD file to write the textures and patch names to.

DuplicateList mergeWith(TextureList otherList);
Merges the textures in this list with the textures from another list. Texture names that already exist are overwritten if the other texture definition differs.

Params:
TextureList otherList The other TextureList object to merge with this one.

void updatePatchNames();
Updates the patch names array and texture patch indices. This should normally be called after modifications have been made to the textures or patches, so that a valid TEXTURE lump can be written from this texture list.

void sort();
Sorts the textures in this list by name. Patch names are unaffected.

protected OrderedAA!(string, TextureDef) getTextures();
Returns:
The textures defined in this list.

void setStrifeMode(const bool strifeMode);
Enables Strife mode for this texture list. When set to true, Strife format TEXTURE lumps will be written by this list.

bool getStrifeMode();
Returns:
true if this texture list was read froma Strife mode TEXTURE lump, or was set as Strife mode previously.

string[] getPatchNames();
Returns:
A list of patch names known to this list.
